eheyin yoshuwa aapasu hari+ hashor+ wethata gos eya yatath karagena ehi rajuwa kaduwen mara damuweya.+ 11 eeshrayel hamudawa ehi siyalu wasiyanwada kaduwen mara damuha.+ ehi eka wasiyekuwath owuhu ithuru nokaloya.+ inpasu yoshuwa hashor nagarayata gini thabuweya. 12 yoshuwa eeshrayelwarunta wiruddhawa nangi siti anik siyalu rajyayan yatath karagena owunge rajawarunwada kaduwen mara damuweya.+ yehowa dewige sewakayeku wu moses ana kala paridi+ yoshuwa owun siyallanwama winasha kirimata niyama kaleya.+ 13 namuth hashor hara, hel matha pihita thibunu wena kisi nagarayakata yoshuwa gini thabuwe natha. 14 eeshrayelwaru ema nagarawala siti siyalu wasiyanwa kaduwen mara damuwoya.+ owungen eka wasiyekuwath owuhu ithuru nokaloya.+ namuth owuhu owunge siyalu wasthuwada sathunwada gaththoya.+ 15 yehowa dewi thama sewaka mosesta ana kala de moses yoshuwata danum di thibina.+ yehowa dewi mosesta ana kala lesama yoshuwa kaleya.
